org.apache.tomcat.util.http.fileupload.servlet

类 ServletRequestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tomcat.util.http.fileupload.servlet.ServletRequestContext
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RequestContext, UploadContext

    public class ServletRequestContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements UploadContext

    Provides access to the request information needed for a request made to an HTTP servlet.

    从以下版本开始:
    FileUpload 1.1

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ServletRequestContext(HttpServletRequest request)
      Construct a context for this request.
